Why didn't you go to the office?
Why do you need this money?
What do you need this money for?
You're a friend of Tom's, aren't you?
You're Tom's friend, aren't you?
You are a friend of Tom's, aren't you?
What club do you belong to?
Where did you get your degree?
What's made you decide to work for our company?
tr: Şirketimizde çalışmaya karar vermene ne sebep oldu?

en: What brings you here?
Don't you play tennis?
You've been deceived.
You smoke too much. You should cut back.
You should stop smoking.
You didn't need to take a taxi.
Whom did you give it to?
You could've done it.
You'll wish you had never seen it.
You should've done it earlier. It can't be helped now.
tr: Daha erken yapmalıydın. Artık yapacak bir şey yok.

en: You should have done it earlier. It can't be helped now.
tr: Daha erken yapmalıydın. Artık yapacak bir şey yok.

en: You don't need to do that right away.
You need not do it at once.
You like it, don't you?
You can do it, can't you?
You must return him the book.
You didn't need to buy the book.
Are you in favor of that policy or are you opposed to it?
tr: O politikadan yana mısın, yoksa karşı mı?

en: You should apologize to her for that.
You shouldn't have gone there.
It would have been better if you had not gone there.
It would've been better if you hadn't gone there.
It would have been better if you hadn't gone there.
You should've done so.
At the most, you'll only be 30 minutes late.
You're not a spy, are you?
You should've told me a long time ago.
You're very courageous.
You'll soon get accustomed to living here.
You should do that right away.
You should do that soon.
You're always making mistakes.
You must read this book.
Have you already read this book?
You may use this car.
You should take advantage of this opportunity.
You should make good use of this opportunity.
All you have to do is sit here.
All you need to do is just sit here.
You shouldn't wait here.
Have you ever seen a koala?
Where in Canada are you from?
What part of Canada are you from?
You'll catch a cold.
You should apologize to your father for not getting home in time for dinner.
tr: Akşam yemeğine zamanında yetişemediğin için babandan özür dilemelisin.

en: You look just like your older brother.
You don't get up as early as your older sister, do you?
tr: Ablan kadar erken kalkmıyorsun, değil mi?

en: You don't get up as early as your sister, do you?
tr: Ablan kadar erken kalkmıyorsun, değil mi?

en: You don't have any money.
Don't you have any money?
You have some money, don't you?
You've started warming up.
You're a good boy.
If you are going to go to America, you should brush up your English.
You're never going to give in, are you?
It'd be better if you didn't associate with men like that.
You shouldn't associate with men like that.
You look like your father looked thirty years ago.
You look as your father looked thirty years ago.
You should take a day off.
You should be ashamed of your stupidity.
You'd best set some money aside for your wedding.
tr: Düğünün için biraz para ayırsan iyi olur.

en: When did you start learning German?
Assuming what you say is true, what should I do?
You have cute eyes.
Do you really want to put your life in her hands?
tr: Hayatını gerçekten onun ellerine bırakmak istiyor musun?

en: Your daughter isn't a child anymore.
I am alarmed by your irresponsible attitude.
You should always keep your room clean.
Your father's friends aren't his only supporters.
tr: Babanın arkadaşları onun tek destekçisi değil.

en: It's your turn.
You are a hopeless idiot.
I forgot your phone number.
I've forgotten your number.
If I had known your telephone number, I would have called you.
If I'd known your telephone number, I would've called you.
Without your advice, I would have failed.
Your birthday is coming soon.
I can't accept your gift.
Your explanation won't wash. It's too improbable to be true.
tr: Açıklaman geçmez. Gerçek olamayacak kadar imkansız.

en: I hear you, but I don't see you.
You have worked hard to succeed.
Your philosophy of life is different than mine.
Your view of existence is different from mine.
You deserve it.
Your new dress really looks good on you.
Let me drive your new Toyota.
Please let me drive your new Toyota.
tr: Yeni Toyota'nı sürmeme izin ver lütfen.

en: Please let me drive your new Toyota, too.
tr: Yeni Toyota'nı ben de süreyim lütfen.

en: We'll make an exception of your case.
I like your way of smiling.
Without your help, I would've failed.
I guess we wouldn't have been able to carry out the plan if it weren't for your help.
tr: Senin yardımın olmasaydı, sanırım planı gerçekleştiremezdik.

en: We'll leave when you're ready.
We'll leave as soon as you're ready.
When will your homework be finished?
When will you finish your homework?
The ice will crack under your weight.
As heavy as you are, the ice will break.
tr: O kadar ağırsın ki buz kırılır.

en: Compared to yours, my car is small.
Don't forget to attach your photo to the application form.
Can I take your picture?
Your question isn't relevant to the subject.
Would you lend me your dictionary?
What time is it now by your watch?
I have no intention of meddling in your affairs.
Do what you think is best.
Do as you please.
What do you do for a living?
What's your occupation?
What is your profession?
I left your umbrella on the bus.
Your composition is the best yet.
tr: Kompozisyonun şu ana kadarkilerin en iyisi.

en: There are no mistakes in your composition.
There is no excuse for your actions.
We've decided to adopt your idea.
We all consider your idea to be impractical.
Nobody cares what you think.
tr: Kimsenin senin ne düşündüğün umurunda değil.

en: What you think doesn't signify at all.
You may invite anyone you like.
You may act as you wish.
You have freedom to travel wherever you like.
I understand what you're trying to say.
I can't understand what you're saying.
I can't understand a word you're saying.
You had better watch your mouth.
What happened to your dog?
I'm sorry to spoil your plans.
There's a big hole in your sock.
If I hadn't had your cooperation, I couldn't have finished the work in time.
tr: Senin işbirliğin olmasaydı, işi zamanında bitiremezdim.

en: Where's your school?
May I use your pencil?
Without your assistance, I would have failed.
Without your assistance, I would've failed.
Your English is flawless.
I totally agree with what you say.
I think what you're doing is right.
It was very hard for me to find your apartment.
You know it better than me.
I'm glad your team won the game.
I would do anything for you.
I'd do anything for you.
Choose the one you like.
Choose whichever you like.
Your joke is funny no matter how many times I hear it.
tr: Şakanı kaç kere duysam da komik geliyor.

en: I like you.
Your mother must've been beautiful when she was young.
I have something that I want to say to you.
tr: Sana söylemek istediğim bir şey var.

en: I sympathize with you.
It's not that I am unsympathetic, but I am not able to help you.
tr: Duyarsız olduğumdan değil, ama sana yardım edemiyorum.

en: I'll boil the beans for you.
I couldn't call you. The telephone was out of order.
Can you tell right from wrong?
Do you know the difference between right and wrong?
tr: Doğruyla yanlış arasındaki farkı biliyor musun?

en: I'll never forget meeting you.
Who's that girl waving at you?
tr: Sana el sallayan şu kız kim?

en: You should have seen it!
I've been wanting to see you.
I'll teach you how to swim.
I wanted to show it to you too.
I'll let you decide.
I'll leave it up to you.
You don't seem to understand their good intentions.
You have no right to do that.
I think that you won't be able to do it.
I never dreamed that I would meet you here.
tr: Seni burada göreceğimi hiç rüyamda görmezdim.

en: Whenever I see you, I always think of my younger brother.
tr: Seni ne zaman görsem, hep küçük kardeşimi düşünürüm.

en: I never see you without thinking of my younger brother.
tr: Seni ne zaman görsem, aklıma küçük kardeşim gelir.

en: I can't imagine my life without you.
I wish I had the time to stay and talk with you.
tr: Keşke seninle kalıp konuşacak zamanım olsaydı.

en: I wish I had more time to talk to you.
tr: Keşke seninle daha fazla konuşacak vaktim olsaydı.

en: Compared to you, I'm just a beginner at this game.
tr: Sana göre, bu oyunda sadece bir acemiyim.

en: Compared to you, I'm only a beginner at this game.
tr: Sana göre, bu oyunda sadece bir acemiyim.

en: You and I have the same idea.
I'd like to go with you, but I'm broke.
tr: Seninle gelmek isterim ama beş kuruşum yok.

en: I want to go with you, but I'm broke.
tr: Seninle gelmek istiyorum ama beş kuruşum yok.

en: I'd prefer to speak to you in private.
tr: Seninle özel olarak konuşmayı tercih ederim.

en: It is high time you went to bed.
tr: Yatağa gitme zamanın geldi de geçiyor bile.

en: You are all diligent.
You must set off at once.
You don't have an alibi for the day of the murder.
Hey guys, please be quiet.
You are the only one who can carry the bag.
I was disappointed because you weren't at home.
tr: Evde olmadığın için hayal kırıklığına uğradım.

en: It's no wonder you ask.
It doesn't matter to me whether you come or not.
tr: Gelip gelmemen benim için fark etmez.

en: Since you're here, we might as well begin.
Since you are here, we might as well begin.
Either you or your friends are wrong.
tr: Ya sen ya da arkadaşların haksız.

en: I'll probably be gone before you get back.
tr: Sen dönmeden ben gitmiş olurum herhalde.

en: I never dreamed that you would lose.
You don't necessarily have to go there.
tr: İlle de oraya gitmene gerek yok.

en: You don't necessarily have to go.
It was wise for you not to follow his advice.
You were wise not to follow his advice.
You were wrong to turn down his help.
You were wrong to refuse his help.
It was a mistake to refuse his assistance.
We thought it was absurd that you got punished.
I'm surprised that you won the prize.
I'm surprised you won the prize.
I was surprised that you won the prize.
I was able to succeed because of your advice.
Because of your advice, I was able to succeed.
Because of the advice that you gave me, I succeeded.
I remember the day you were born very well.
I guess you're right.
I'm glad that you succeeded.
I'm glad you succeeded.
Your O's look like A's.
After you had left, he came.
Nothing tastes as good as the food that you make.
You must go.
I don't care as long as you're happy.
tr: Sen mutlu olduğun sürece sorun değil benim için.

en: I don't understand what you are trying to say.
I know that you are rich.
By the time you get back, she'll have left.
tr: Sen dönene kadar o gitmiş olur.

en: If you're wrong, then I'm wrong, too.
It's a pity that you can't travel with us.
I'll come again when you're free.
I don't mind what you do.
The situation got complicated because you refused your support.
What's that thing in your right hand?
You're to blame.
I'm looking forward to your letter!
I'm looking forward to getting your letter.
I'm looking forward to your letter.
I'm looking forward to receiving letters from you.
You can do whatever you want.
You can do whatever you want to do.
Say what you will, I think he is honest.
tr: Ne dersen de, bence o dürüst.

en: It's obvious why you have a stomachache.
It's obvious why your stomach hurts.
No matter how fast you walk, you won't be able to catch up with him.
tr: Ne kadar hızlı yürürsen yürü, ona yetişemezsin.

en: How can I feel relaxed with you watching me like that?
tr: Bana öyle bakarken nasıl rahat olabilirim ki?

en: I wish you hadn't told that story to my mother.
It's too bad that you couldn't come.
It's a pity you couldn't come.
You're saying you wrote this book?
tr: Bu kitabı sen mi yazdın diyorsun?

en: I'll miss you after you've gone.
After you leave, we'll be very sad.
It'll be really lonely without you.
You're not here, so I'm really sad.
tr: Sen burada değilsin, o yüzden çok üzgünüm.

en: I'm lonely without you.
You've been missed.
